name: Sqfundrich
body:
fundrich API documentation version v1

http://10.1.81.211:80/fundrich_api/v1

/articles

官網 全文搜尋 與 CMS 新增/更新研報、議題

/articles get post

get

不指定 Type (基金、fund、議題 theme、研報 report)，進行全文搜尋功能，Get articles list from all type table

post

新增一筆議題、研報，Add new article information

get /articles

不指定 Type (基金、fund、議題 theme、研報 report)，進行全文搜尋功能，Get articles list from all type table

  • Request
  • Response

Query Parameters

  • keyword: required (string)

    搜尋字詞

    Example:

    英國
  • startindex: required (integer)

    start index in ES table

    Example:

    1
  • offset: required (integer - default: 10)

    每個 Type 回傳的筆數

    Example:

    2

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "total": 6,
  "hits":{
    "fund":[
      {
        "pid":"IUKEGB",
        "title":"施羅德環球基金系列 - 英國股票 C 類股份 - 累積單位(英鎊)",
        "titleEng":"Schroder ISF UK Equity C Acc",
        "StarRating":4,
        "RiskRating":1,
        "score":"3.73"
      },
      {
        "pid":"0P00000AZI",
        "title":"貝萊德英國基金 A2",
        "titleEng":"BGF United Kingdom A2",
        "StarRating":4,
        "RiskRating":1,
        "score":"3.1"
      }
    ],
    "theme":[
      {
        "pid":"33",
        "title":"英國脫歐後，維持債券投資的三個理由",
        "subtitle":"6月23日英國公投決定正式脫歐，事前數個月的不確定性，事後繼續延燒。隨著塵埃落定，聯博認為投資人不應該「出脫」債券基金，其中有三個理由。",
        "imgUrl":"",
        "score":"2.12"
      },
      {
        "pid":"28",
        "title":"英國退歐、行情風雲變色",
        "subtitle":"六月份黃金基金閃亮",
        "imgUrl":"Theme_28.jpg",
        "score":"2.12"
      }
  ],
  "report":[
    {
      "pid":"1",
      "title":"新興債為經理人加碼度最高的債市1",
      "score":"2.12",
      "pdfUrl":"/fundrich/Report_1.pdf"
    },
    {
      "pid":"14",
      "title":"英國脫歐：何去何從？",
      "score":"2.12",
      "pdfUrl":"/fundrich/Report_2.pdf"
    }
  ]
}
}

HTTP status code 404

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"message": "Can't connect to Elasticsearch"
}

post /articles

新增一筆議題、研報，Add new article information

  • Request
  • Response

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

- theme:
  {
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
      "pid":  {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題ID",
        "required": true
              },
      "type": {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題: theme",
        "required": true
              },
      "title":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題標題"
              },
      "subtitle":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題子標題"
              },
      "summary":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題摘要"
              },
      "content":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題內文"
              },
      "imgUrl":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題圖片路徑"
              },
      "origin":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題來源/作者"
              },
      "startViews":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題增值點閱數"
        },
      "onDate":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "上架日期"
              },
      "offDate":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "下架日期"
              },
      "availableMode":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "有效碼 0:無效,1:有效"
              },
      "publishTime":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "議題發稿日期"
              },
      "addKeywords":{
        "type": "nested",
        "description": "此次操作有新增的 Keywords"
              }
    }
-report:
  {
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
      "pid":  {
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研報ID",
        "required": true
              },
      "type":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研報 report",
        "required": true
        },
      "title":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研報標題"
            },
      "summary":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研報摘要"
            },
      "pdfUrl":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研究報告PDF路徑"
            },
      "origin":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研報來源"
              },
      "addRelatedFund":{
        "type": "array",
        "description": "新增研報的相關基金"
              },
      "startViews":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "研報增值點閱數"
              },
      "addKeywords":{
        "type": "nested",
        "description": "有效的 Keywords"
              },
      "deleteKeywords":{
        "type": "nested",
        "description": "無效的 Keywords，即使用者刪除的 Keywords"
              },
      "onDate":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "上架日期"
              },
      "offDate":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "下架日期"
              },
      "availableMode":{
        "type": "string",
        "description": "有效碼 0:無效,1:有效"
              }
    }

Example:

- theme:
{
  "pid":"500",
  "type":"theme",
  "origin":"鉅亨網",
  "title":"近五年原幣報酬率位居亞洲債券型基金組別第一(台灣核備銷售)-貝萊德亞洲老虎債券基金A2美元",
  "subtitle":"貝萊德亞洲老虎債券基金的表現相對穩定",
  "summary":"基金績效及風險方面: 在晨星亞洲債券型基金組別中，貝萊德亞洲老虎債券基金的表現相對穩定。受惠於此基金在國家及產業",
  "content":"亞洲國家在經歷亞洲金融風暴後，經濟體質越見改善；其中，中國近年政府債務佔GDP的比例，低於已開發國家....",
  "addKeywords":[{"keywordName":"債券基金","score":"10"}],
  "deleteKeywords":[{"keywordName":"GDP"}],
  "onDate":"2016-06-23",
  "offDate":"2016-10-23",
  "availableMode":"1",
  "imgUrl":"Theme_8.jpg",
  "startViews":"100",
  "publishTime":"2016-06-23"

}
- report:
{
  "pid":"1",
  "type":"report",
  "origin":"富蘭克林證券投顧1",
  "title":"新興債為經理人加碼度最高的債市1",
  "summary":"英國退歐公投在即，市場普遍抱持觀望態度而不敢躁進，恐慌氣氛更一度使得美國十年期公債殖利率跌破支撐、德國公債降至負利率水準，但美銀美林證券六月例行的全球固定收益型基金經理人調查中顯示，除了新興國家公債加碼度上升外，受訪經理人對美國等多數債市看好度呈現下滑，尤其邊陲歐洲國家公債看多部位更大幅下降，風險趨避心態濃厚，美元則是唯一獲加碼的貨幣。1",
  "addRelatedFund":["法巴百利達亞洲可換股債券基金/月配 (美元)","法巴百利達美國股票基金 C (美元)"],
  "addKeywords":[{"keywordName":"英國","score":"10"},{"keywordName":"股票","score":"1"},{"keywordName":"股債混合","score":"1"},{"keywordName":"產業股票","score":"1"},{"keywordName":"目標期限","score":"1"},{"keywordName":"保證基金","score":"1"},{"keywordName":"美國","score":"9"},{"keywordName":"全球","score":"1"},{"keywordName":"成熟市場","score":"5"},{"keywordName":"新興市場","score":"10"}],
  "onDate":"2016-06-22",
  "offDate":"2016-08-04",
  "availableMode":"1",
  "startViews":"1001",
  "pdfUrl":"/fundrich/Report_1.pdf"
}

HTTP status code 201

Body

Type: application/json

HTTP status code 400

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "[report][3]: document already exists"
  "localized_message": "[report][3]: document already exists"
}

HTTP status code 404

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "message": "Can't connect to Elasticsearch"
 }

/articles/types/{type} get

get

根據指定的 type (基金、fund、議題 theme、研報 report)，進行全文搜尋功能，Get articles list where type = {type}

get /articles/types/{type}

根據指定的 type (基金、fund、議題 theme、研報 report)，進行全文搜尋功能，Get articles list where type = {type}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • type: required (string)

    議題 theme, 基金 fund, 研報 report

Query Parameters

  • keyword: required (string)

    搜尋字詞

    Example:

    英國
  • startindex: required (integer)

    start index in ES table

  • offset: required (integer - default: 10)

    回傳的筆數

    Example:

    2

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "total": 2,
  "hits":[
    {
      "pid":"IUKEGB",
      "title":"施羅德環球基金系列 - 英國股票 C 類股份 - 累積單位(英鎊)",
      "titleEng":"Schroder ISF UK Equity C Acc",
      "StarRating":4,
      "RiskRating":1,
      "score":"3.73"
    },
    {
      "pid":"0P00000AZI",
      "title":"貝萊德英國基金 A2",
      "titleEng":"BGF United Kingdom A2",
      "StarRating":4,
      "RiskRating":1,
      "score":"3.1"
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 404

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"message": "Can't connect to Elasticsearch"
}

/articles/{articleId} get post delete

get

根據 articleId，取得基金、議題的關鍵字列表，score 分數為關鍵字的重要性，分數由高至低可作為排序用途，source為關鍵字的來源 manual 代表人工給定，metadata 表示研報PDF檔的 metadata 給予的關鍵字，auto表示 Etu 自動萃取出來的，Get article keywords with articleId = {articleId}

post

更新議題、研報的資訊(標題、內容、作者、關鍵字列表...)addKeywords 為有效的 Keywords，deleteKeywords為無效的 Keywords (黑名單)，Update ariticle information with articleId = {articleId}

delete

刪除一筆研報、議題

get /articles/{articleId}

根據 articleId，取得基金、議題的關鍵字列表，score 分數為關鍵字的重要性，分數由高至低可作為排序用途，source為關鍵字的來源 manual 代表人工給定，metadata 表示研報PDF檔的 metadata 給予的關鍵字，auto表示 Etu 自動萃取出來的，Get article keywords with articleId = {articleId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • articleId: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • type: required (string)

    議題 theme, 基金 fund, 研報 report

    Example:

    report
  • size: (integer - default: 10)

    關鍵字個數

    Example:

    3

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "total": 4,
  "hits":[
    {
      "term":"避險基金",
      "score":"4",
      "source":["manual"]
    },
    {
      "term":"成熟市場",
      "score":"3",
      "source":["manual","metadata"]
    },
    {
      "term":"脫歐",
      "score":"2",
      "source":["metadata"]
    },
    {
      "term":"英國公投結果",
      "score":"1",
      "source":["metadata","auto"]
    }
  ]
}

HTTP status code 404

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
 "message": "Can't connect to Elasticsearch"
}

post /articles/{articleId}

更新議題、研報的資訊(標題、內容、作者、關鍵字列表...)addKeywords 為有效的 Keywords，deleteKeywords為無效的 Keywords (黑名單)，Update ariticle information with articleId = {articleId}

  • Request
  • Response

URI Parameters

  • articleId: required (string)

Body

Type: application/json

Schema:

-theme:
  {
   "type": "object",
   "properties": {
     "type":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題 theme",
       "required": true
       },
     "title":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題標題"
           },
     "subtitle":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題子標題"
           },
     "summary":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題摘要"
           },
     "content":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題內文"
           },
     "imgUrl":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題圖片路徑"
             },
     "origin":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題發布來源/作者"
             },
     "startViews":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題增值點閱數"
             },
     "addKeywords":{
       "type": "nested",
       "description": "有效的 Keywords"
             },
     "deleteKeywords":{
       "type": "nested",
       "description": "無效的 Keywords，即使用者刪除的 Keywords"
             },
     "onDate":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "上架日期"
             },
     "offDate":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "下架日期"
               },
     "availableMode":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "有效碼 0:無效,1:有效"
             },
     "publishTime":{
       "type": "string",
       "description": "議題發稿日期"
             }
     }
-report:
   {
     "type": "object",
     "properties": {
       "type":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報 report",
         "required": true
         },
       "title":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報標題"
             },
       "subtitle":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報子標題"
             },
       "summary":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報摘要"
             },
       "pdfUrl":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報 PDf 檔案路徑"
             },
       "origin":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報來源"
               },
       "addRelatedFund":{
         "type": "array",
         "description": "新增研報的相關基金"
               },
       "deleteRelatedFund":{
         "type": "array",
         "description": "刪除研報的相關基金"
               },
       "startViews":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "研報增值點閱數"
               },
       "addKeywords":{
         "type": "nested",
         "description": "有效的 Keywords"
               },
       "deleteKeywords":{
         "type": "nested",
         "description": "無效的 Keywords，即使用者刪除的 Keywords"
               },
       "onDate":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "上架日期"
               },
       "offDate":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "下架日期"
               },
       "availableMode":{
         "type": "string",
         "description": "有效碼 0:無效,1:有效"
               }
     }

Example:

 {
  "pid":"500",
  "type":"theme",
  "origin":"鉅亨網",
  "title":"近五年原幣報酬率位居亞洲債券型基金組別第一(台灣核備銷售)-貝萊德亞洲老虎債券基金A2美元",
  "subtitle":"貝萊德亞洲老虎債券基金的表現相對穩定",

  "addKeywords":[{"keywordName":"債券基金","score":"1"}],
  "deleteKeywords":[{"keywordName":"GDP"}],
  "onDate":"2016-06-23",

  "availableMode":"1",
  "imgUrl":"Theme_8.jpg",
  "startViews":"100",
  "publishTime":"2016-06-23"
  }

  {
  "pid":"1",
  "type":"report",
  "origin":"富蘭克林證券投顧1",
  "title":"新興債為經理人加碼度最高的債市1",

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

HTTP status code 404

Type: application/json

Example:

 "message": "Can't connect to Elasticsearch"

delete /articles/{articleId}

刪除一筆研報、議題

  • Request

URI Parameters

  • articleId: required (string)

Query Parameters

  • type: required (string)

    議題 theme, 研報 report

    Example:

    report

/popularword

官網自動提示字的靜態檔 與 CMS 的熱門搜尋字

/popularword get

get

官網自動提示字的靜態檔 與 CMS 的熱門搜尋字

get /popularword

官網自動提示字的靜態檔 與 CMS 的熱門搜尋字

  • Request
  • Response

Query Parameters

  • startdate: required (string - default: now - 7day)

    計算的起始日期，預設為前7天

    Example:

    2016-10-30
  • enddate: required (string - default: now)

    計算的結束日期，預設為今天

    Example:

    2016-11-02

HTTP status code 200

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
  "total": 3,
  "hits":[
  {
    "word":"美國",
    "count":400,
    "hasFund":true,
    "hasTheme":true,
    "hasReport":true
  },
  {
    "word":"總統大選",
    "count":1100,
    "hasFund":false,
    "hasTheme":true,
    "hasReport":true
  },
  {
    "word":"川普",
    "count":500,
    "hasFund":false,
    "hasTheme":true,
    "hasReport":true
  },
  ]
}

HTTP status code 404

Body

Type: application/json

Example:

{
"message": "Can't connect to Elasticsearch"
}
  • /articles
  • /popularword
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
